text: Julia Holter (born December 18, 1984) is an American singer, songwriter, record producer, composer and artist. Her first studio album, Tragedy, was released in 2011. She released a second album, Ekstasis, in March 2012. This album was compared to works by such artists as Laurie Anderson, Kate Bush, Joanna Newsom and several others. Ekstasis received many positive reviews. Holter joined Domino Recording Company. She then released her 3rd album Loud City Song. The album was a critical success. She released Have You in My Wilderness in 2015. The album was very successful. ==References== Category:Singers from Los Angeles Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American composers Category:1984 births Category:Living people
title: Julia Holter
